resources.string: To make a call, please grant the app Phone and Microphone permissions to access Call on your Android device.
It seems that you permanently denied Phone and Microphone permissions. To enable it, please go to your device settings, and grant it Phone and Microphone permissions in order to make a call.
To capture a image or record a video, please grant the app Camera and Microphone permissions to access Camera and microphone on your Android device.
It seems that you permanently denied Camera and Microphone permissions. To enable it, please go to your device settings, and grant it Camera and Microphone permissions in order to record a video.
